Rule.Description: Only "Tenured/tenure-track faculty" or "Non-tenure-track research faculty" can "Add" a "Whole Proposal"
"Teaching faculty", "Research staff", "Professional staff", "Administrator" cannot "Add" a "Whole Proposal" unless delegated by faculty
"PI" can "View" proposal "Audit Log"

"PI" can "Edit" "Investigator Information", "InvestigatorInformation.PI", "InvestigatorInformation.Co-PI", "InvestigatorInformation.Senior-Personnel", "Project Information","Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "Certification/Signatures", "Appendices" when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI is NOTDELETED

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "PI" can not "Edit" "OSP Section"
"PI" can "Add" "InvestigatorInformation.Co-PI" and "InvestigatorInformation.Senior-Personnel" Only when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI is NOTDELETED
"PI" can "Delete" both "InvestigatorInformation.Co-PI" and "InvestigatorInformation.Senior-Personnel" when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI is NOTDELETED
"Co-PI" can "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Appendices" and "Certification/Signatures" Only when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI is NOTDELETED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI is False

"Co-PI" can not "Edit" "Project Information","Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information","OSP Section" when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI is NOTDELETED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI is False

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "Co-PI" can "Add" Only "InvestigatorInformation.Senior-Personnel" when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI is NOTDELETED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI is False
"Co-PI" can "Delete" "InvestigatorInformation.Senior-Personnel" Only when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI is NOTDELETED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI is False
"Co-PI" cannot "Add" "InvestigatorInformation.Co-PI" when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI is NOTDELETED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI is False
"Co-PI" cannot "Delete" "InvestigatorInformation.Co-PI" when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI is NOTDELETED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI is False

"Senior Personnel" cannot "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "Certification/Signatures", "OSP Section", "Appendices" Section when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI is NOTDELETED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI is False

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "PI" can "Save" an Existing "Whole Proposal" when SubmittedByPI = NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI = NOTDELETED and "Co-PI" can "Save" an Existing "Whole Proposal" when SubmittedByPI = NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI = NOTDELETED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI = False
"PI" can "Submit" a "Whole Proposal" when SubmittedByPI = NOTSUBMITTED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI = True and DeletedByPI = NOTDELETED
"PI" can "Delete" a "Whole Proposal" when SubmittedByPI = NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI = NOTDELETED
"Department Chair" can "Edit" "Certification/Signatures" when ApprovedByDepartmentChair = READYFORAPPROVAL

"Department Chair" cannot "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "OSP Section", "Appendices" Section when ApprovedByDepartmentChair = READYFORAPPROVAL

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "Department Chair" can "Approve" a "Whole Proposal" when ApprovedByDepartmentChair = READYFORAPPROVAL
"Department Chair" can "Disapprove" a "Whole Proposal" when ApprovedByDepartmentChair = READYFORAPPROVAL
"Business Manager" can "Edit" "Sponsor and Budget Information" and "Certification/Signatures" when ApprovedByBusinessManager = READYFORAPPROVAL

"Business Manager" cannot "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "OSP Section", "Appendices" Section when ApprovedByBusinessManager = READYFORAPPROVAL

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "Business Manager" can "Approve" a "Whole Proposal" when ApprovedByBusinessManager = READYFORAPPROVAL
"Business Manager" can "Disapprove" a "Whole Proposal" when ApprovedByBusinessManager = READYFORAPPROVAL
"Dean" can "Edit" and "Certification/Signatures" when ApprovedByDean = READYFORAPPROVAL

"Dean" cannot "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "OSP Section", "Appendices" Section when ApprovedByDean = READYFORAPPROVAL

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "Dean" can "Approve" a "Whole Proposal" when ApprovedByDean = READYFORAPPROVAL
"Dean" can "Disapprove" a "Whole Proposal" when ApprovedByDean = READYFORAPPROVAL
"IRB" can "Edit" and "Certification/Signatures" when ApprovedByIRB = READYFORAPPROVAL

"IRB" cannot "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "OSP Section", "Appendices" Section when ApprovedByIRB = READYFORAPPROVAL

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "IRB" can "Approve" a "Whole Proposal" when ApprovedByIRB = READYFORAPPROVAL
"IRB" can "Disapprove" a "Whole Proposal" when ApprovedByIRB = READYFORAPPROVAL

"University Research Administrator" can "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "OSP Section", "Certification/Signatures" Section when ApprovedByUniversityResearchAdministrator = READYFORAPPROVAL

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "University Research Administrator" cannot edit Appendices when ApprovedByUniversityResearchAdministrator = READYFORAPPROVAL
"University Research Administrator" can "Approve" a "Whole Proposal" when ApprovedByUniversityResearchAdministrator = READYFORAPPROVAL
"University Research Administrator" can "Disapprove" a "Whole Proposal" when ApprovedByUniversityResearchAdministrator = READYFORAPPROVAL
"University Research Administrator" can "Withdraw" a "Whole Proposal" when ApprovedByUniversityResearchAdministrator = READYFORAPPROVAL and WithdrawnByUniversityResearchAdministrator = NOTWITHDRAWN
"University Research Administrator" can "Submit" a "Whole Proposal" when SubmittedByUniversityResearchAdministrator = NOTSUBMITTED and ApprovedByUniversityResearchDirector = APPROVED
"University Research Director" can edit "Certification/Signatures" and "OSP Section" when ApprovedByUniversityResearchDirector = READYFORAPPROVAL

"University Research Administrator" cannot "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information" "Appendices"Section when ApprovedByUniversityResearchDirector = READYFORAPPROVAL

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "University Research Director" can "Approve" a "Whole Proposal" when ApprovedByUniversityResearchDirector=READYFORAPPROVAL
"University Research Director" can "Disapprove" a "Whole Proposal" when ApprovedByUniversityResearchDirector = READYFORAPPROVAL
"University Research Director" can "Delete" a "Whole Proposal" when ApprovedByUniversityResearchDirector = READYFORAPPROVAL and DeletedByUniversityResearchDirector = NOTDELETED
"University Research Director" can "Archive" a "Whole Proposal" when ArchivedByUniversityResearchDirector = NOTARCHIVED and SubmittedByUniversityResearchAdministrator = SUBMITTED
